name: Stick it
description:
In a dreamlike fantasy world inhabited by cute bouncy slimes, fight your way through multiple trials by jumping and sticking to walls!

StickIt is a multiplayer couch game, where your goal is to defeat the others players in two differents game modes that goes by at the frantic rhythm of your leaps.

You play as a slime who moves by using his body to jump,  stick to every walls and fight just to take the high ground on your enemies and become the biggest slime at the end of your journey !

Mouve on the menu with the Pad

Choose direction to jump with L3 (Ps) / L  (Xbox)

Jump with X (Ps) / A (Xbox)

Game Designers

 (Lead) Stanislas Rado - Rémy Schlaeintzauer - Yoan Saboureau

Game Programmers

(Lead) Alex Copin - Vincent Boutin - Virginie Nguyen - Julien Quentin

Game Artists

(Lead) Jeanne Cabon - Tamara Dimovski

Sound Designer

(Lead) Rémi Vu Dinh Ba - Alexis Corsand

Producers

Marie Wajsblat - Olivier de Benoist - Karim Amara - Ricardo Mora

This game was developed in 2 months for our year-end project in the Institut de l’internet et du multimédia in Paris. We had a lot of fun working on this project, so please enjoy it
